entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ref field initializer is treated as a value assignment #64725
    17.5
  • csharpsourcegenerators.findreferencesforfilewithdefinitioninsourcegeneratedfile(false) #64721
    17.5 P1
  • Syntax error parsing field initializer with `ref` expression #64720
    17.5
  • Obsolete diagnostic not reported for type named `var` brought by `using static` #64713
    Backlog
  • Extension methods from ASP.NET Core-related packages do not trigger the C# suggested usings feature in VS #64712
  • vs2022 not working with sdk 7.0.100 #64704
  • undocumented use of `NotNullWhenAttribute`/`MaybeNullWhenAttribute` on `out` parameter in method with nullable non-bool return type #64703
  • 'Go to Definition' Context-Menu option #64702
  • Add WithAdditionalDocumentText and WithAnalyzerConfigDocumentText overload that take all linked document IDs #64701
  • Not handling all combinations of named enum values and booleans should give a CS8509 warning regardless of order, even if warnings are disabled for CS8524 #64698
  • editorconfig naming rule violations do not throw warnings #64697
    17.5

Closed

  • IntelliSense doesn't work for interface statics when dotting a type parameter #64182
    17.5
  • Static virtual members of interfaces are not included into completion list on a type parameter #61255
    17.4
  • SourceGenerator: No defining declaration found for implementing declaration of partial method #64664
  • Don't infer a val escape on 'out scoped var' #64556
    17.5
  • Support `scoped` modifier for other local declarations #62039
    17.5
  • No error reported for `ref` type in a declaration expression #64259
    17.5
  • IDE0060 is reported incorrectly when parameters has nullable attributes attached #64215
  • Allow suppression and configuration of compilation level diagnostics #50035
    Backlog
  • IDE0029 and IDE0030 have the same title #63259
    Backlog
  • Roslyn ignores the minus operator from -NaN #64690

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure we include a projectId along with our ProjectChanged notification #64722
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • Report obsolete diagnostics for types named var/unmanaged/notnull #64717
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Additional tests for ref fields #64707
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix ArgumentOutOfRangeException from using speculative semantic model #64691
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P1
  • [LSP] Write lsp logs to xunit output during tests #64689
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Ignore private methods for awaitable types in IDE0051 #64688
    Area-Analyzers, Community

Merged

  • Inline Hints - ArgumentOutOfRangeException #64694
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • Respond to missed feedback #64513
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64723
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64724
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Load CompletionProvider from references in background"" #64719
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Cherry-pick always bind ctors #64710
    Area-Compilers, Approved to merge, New Feature - Required Members, OnDeckForQB
  • Fix static virtual interface members not included in type parameter completion #64716
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • VB ConvertTupleToStruct should not include NullableAttributes in it #64647
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not offer name completion after dotted expressions which do not bind to types #64718
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove exportProvider parameter from TestWorkspace ctor #64221
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64715
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix static virtual interface members not included in type parameter completion #64708
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64714
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Add EE and VS impl packages to PublishData.json #64709
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Allow packages to be not published #64695
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64613
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update M.CA.Testing version to 1.1.2-beta1.22512.1 #64684
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Create source texts for open buffers with the new default source hash algorithm #64668
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64706
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64699
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add support for Suppression/Configuration fixes for build-only diagno… #63835
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64696
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Make titles for IDE0029 and IDE0030 unique #64685
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64693
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update references to ref fields spec #64686
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix crash in MetadataAsSource when opening loose (misc) files #64683
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64728
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64727
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Scoped implicitly-typed lambda parameters #64680
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in NavigateTo OOP calls. #64576
    Area-IDE
  • Speculative semantic model - create child member models for attributes and parameter default values. #64634
    Area-Compilers
  • Unskip CSharpSoruceGenerators.InvokeNavigateToForGeneratedFile test #64626
    Area-IDE
  • Update VS Platform NuGet package version #64667
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Use workspace services to implement test hooks #64158
    Area-IDE
  • Disable Windows PDB conversion #64581
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Extend test coverage for lambda default parameters #64530
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix nullable walker cycle #64600
    Area-Compilers
  • Track local constant usage in attributes #64660
    Area-Compilers
  • Suppress IOperation validation for lambda parameter initializers #64630
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Name anonymous delegate parameters #64604
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
